column1: #Text=Hakoda says : " You 're not old enough to go to war , Sokka , you know that . "
#Text=Sokka says : " I 'm strong , I 'm brave , I can fight !
#Text=And for you right now , that 's here , protecting your sister .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do n't understand .
#Text=I 'm gon na miss you so much .
